title: Giant Alliance XTC 26" Mountain Bike
text:
I'm selling my Giant Alliance XTC mountain bike in excellent condition. This is the carbon-alloy frame (M), meaning the bicycle is extremely lightweight (12 kg - 13 kg) compared to similar purpose bicycles. It is perfect for scenarios and tracks where you climb with or have to carry the bicycle. Dual Valve hand pump included.

Condition: Bicycle is in excellent condition and just serviced to be ready for sale. All parts and components in perfect working order. Very few scratches or marks on the paint. Only right-side foot pedal reflector cracked.

No scratches, I'm the only owner and purchased new. All fittings and adapters available. Silverback Road bike - 11 gear at rear & 2 at front. Road bike (was used with Kickr on Zwift). Perfect for online swift training and races And afternoon road rides with friends. Giant Stance 2 29er 2020 model Giant Stance 2. Bike is in mint condition. Purchased from Hattons Pietermaritzburg in October 2020. Size is M/S (I am a medium and fits me perfectly. This bike was used for competition races only. No scratches and paint is in immaculate condition. Some details are Size - M/SBrakes - Hydraulic disc brakesFrame - Aluminum 120 MM travel suspensionFront fork - 130 MM boost suspensionRims - 29 alloy, Tubeless readyDrive chain - 1X12 SramPedals - Cleats (read up online more about the specs of this bike). Also have cycling cleat boots, clipless paddles, water bottles, cycling computer, 3L water backpack, spare tyres, some tools for the bikes, repair kits, pump, helmets andcycling clothing that I can throw in free. This add is everything you are looking for if you really want to take on cycling or up your training and performance. Contact me for viewing 072 959 9673

No more clashing of handlebars, seats etc. The inverted U support frame is a good size so supporting 29ers in the upright position is not a problem.Features:* Stable and convenient bike carrier for 50mm tow-bar/tow-ball mounting* NO Spanner required to mount or dismount the bike carrier* The bike carrier tilts back, giving trunk access without off-loading the bikes* Folds flat for easy storage* Lockable to tow-bar* Adjustable wheel holders with soft straps for accommodating most types of bikes* Suitable for carbon frame bikes with holder attached to the seat post* Vertical frame folds flat for easy storage, compact enough to be kept in the trunk of the car* Standard big round 7-pin power plug for the light board* Carries up to 4 bikes, 60kg load capacity* 1 Year factory warranty* CE certified* Original and patented design* Weight: 15kg* Dimensions: 110cm x 77cm x 18cmSKU: 14969

title: CONVERT YOUR BICYCLE TO ELECTRIC | E-BIKE CONVERSIONS | SEND  YOUR BIKE FOR CONVERSION TO  ELECTRIC
text: Electric bikesAre you looking for an electric bike that suits you?Are you looking for an e-bike that specifically suits your own sitting position ,height , weight and your overall levels of comfort needs? We saw how people like you are frustrated with not being able to enjoy rides they way you should. And the lack of companies who really care to ensure they match the customers needs with the right e-bike system.  The Prime goal - Experience fun and exercise on an electric bike built to one's own individual needs.1. SUPPORT SUSTAINABILITY AND NON-WASTE :You may already own a bicycle that suits your preferences in frame size and specs . It's sitting there unused Or if you dont already own a bike pls check our website to see if you fancy any of our complete e-bikes:www.chilledsquirrel.comIf you currently  own a normal bicycle / bike and are in the market for an  electric bike  then it is super  important that you do your homework before rushing ahead to sell your bike. Just the air shock alone on your bike today alone may be worth over R10,000! Prices of some branded components have sky-rocketed .Selling your bike second hand as a used bike is likely to be at a loss due to the poor ROI (return on investment) for used bikes in South Africa and the inconvenience of of having to sell it.It would be smarter to upgrade your current bike to electric via a seamless conversion with new e-bike pedal assist technology .Our team can help you evaluate this. Please take 1 minute to fill in this form and a member of our Chilled Team can ge back to you:https://www.chilledsquirrel.com/convertbiketoelectric2. SEAMLESS INTEGRATIONIn 2014 we converted bicycles for Google's New JHB offices for staff commuting . Since then we have continued upgrading systems as the technology has improved for motors and batteries . Int'l EU tested standard motor + battery systems .3. MORE CHOICES & FLEXIBILITYChoices of mid drive and hub drive systems that are fully serviceable in S.A.A complete electric bike with your own personalized level of power , range and comfort at a reasonable investment.4. LOCAL SUPPORT | SERVICES.A company that cares and is truly passionate about what we do and the value it brings to others.We deliver door-to-door Nation-wide in S.A with local support helping you care for ,maintain and service your e-bike.100% Satisfaction & Money Back GuaranteeChilled Squirrel Electric Bikes www.chilledsquirrel.comTel 0214470304WhatsApp: 065 513 1524

SUPPORTS SUSTAINABILITY AND NON-WASTE :You already own a bicycle that suits your preferences in frame size and specs . It's sitting there unused.Why not turn it into adventures and a new desire to ride again?Make valuable use of something that already exists by upgrading it to an electric bicycle.2. title: 2018 Yt Tues Pro Race Carbon - XL
text:
Selling my 2018 Yt Tues Carbon in XL frame size. (Sized closer to a Large)

I bought this bike in April of 2021 and it was still BRAND NEW and UNOPENED from the factory in its original box and disassembled. 
Everything on the bike is carbon. The frame, swingarm, wheels, handlebars, cranks, derailleur, shifter even the seatpost. The bike weighs about 15.4kgs without pedals.


I had about 10-12 occasions of bike park riding on it at Highland Bike Park in New Hampshire, USA. Also 1 day at Hellsend, Stellenbosch, and that's it. The bike still has its OEM signature tyres on as 'proof' of the mileage(or lack thereof)

This puppy also has had a full service done by TheBikePark in Constantia Uitsig and both fork and shock has been serviced by Omnico (still have the receipts). It has not been ridden since.

Included are some extras:
E*thirteen valves for tubeless setup
Factory ODI AG signature grips
Extra E*thirteen crank shoes
ODI race number board
Crank Bros. Stamp 7 pedals(with spare pins)
AM Camo frame protection on top tube, shock pivot and swingarm
and the owners manuals.

Also have a bunch of gear to sell separately(too much to mention) I'm 184cm and just about 80kg.

Price is firm, I'm in no rush to sell, I'm just doing it a great disservice by not letting it shred as it was meant to.

Cheers, Marten

Unmatched fun on each trail. The carbon frame model has a lightweight and superior reactivity behavior. Besides the power, the motor's strengths are its quietness and smoothness pedalling even when the motor is off.

Installed on the XTF 1.6 CARBON SPORT is the NEW BROSE S MAG MOTOR, designed for the most competitive riders. THE BEST ELECTRIC MOTOR FOR E-MTB OF 2019 (*) Its compactness, low weight (only 2.8kg), instant power and more control on steep terrain, no pedaling resistance even with the motor off. title: ELECTRIC BIKES COMPLETE E-MTB BUILT IN S.A OR CONVERT YOUR MTB TO ELECTRIC
text: Electric bikesAre you looking for an electric bike that suits you?Are you looking for an e-bike that specifically suits your own sitting position ,height , weight and your overall levels of comfort needs? We saw how people like you are frustrated with not being able to enjoy rides they way you should. And the lack of companies who really care to ensure they match the customers needs with the right e-bike system.  The Prime goal - Experience fun and exercise on an electric bike built to one's own individual needs.1. SUPPORT SUSTAINABILITY AND NON-WASTE :You may already own a bicycle that suits your preferences in frame size and specs . It's sitting there unused Or if you dont already own a bike pls check our website to see if you fancy any of our complete e-bikes:www.chilledsquirrel.comIf you currently  own a normal bicycle / bike and are in the market for an  electric bike  then it is super  important that you do your homework before rushing ahead to sell your bike. Just the air shock alone on your bike today alone may be worth over R10,000! Prices of some branded components have sky-rocketed .Selling your bike second hand as a used bike is likely to be at a loss due to the poor ROI (return on investment) for used bikes in South Africa and the inconvenience of of having to sell it.It would be smarter to upgrade your current bike to electric via a seamless conversion with new e-bike pedal assist technology .Our team can help you evaluate this. Please take 1 minute to fill in this form and a member of our Chilled Team can ge back to you:https://www.chilledsquirrel.com/convertbiketoelectric2. SEAMLESS INTEGRATIONIn 2014 we converted bicycles for Google's New JHB offices for staff commuting . Since then we have continued upgrading systems as the technology has improved for motors and batteries . Int'l EU tested standard motor + battery systems .3. MORE CHOICES & FLEXIBILITYChoices of mid drive and hub drive systems that are fully serviceable in S.A.A complete electric bike with your own personalized level of power , range and comfort at a reasonable investment.4. LOCAL SUPPORT | SERVICES.A company that cares and is truly passionate about what we do and the value it brings to others.We deliver door-to-door Nation-wide in S.A with local support helping you care for ,maintain and service your e-bike.100% Satisfaction & Money Back GuaranteePrices From R24,999. text: SPRINGBOK E-MTB HARDTAILRESERVE YOURS.DELIVERY DOOR-TO-DOOR BEFORE 25 DECEMBER 2022 TO ALL MAJOR CITIES* AND TOWNS*( *REMOTE AREA DELIVERIES: ADDITIONAL COURIER FEES MAY BE ADDED AT TIME OF DELIVERY)Consider Financing your Springbok with Yonda starting at R1089 per month.Model Name : SPRINGBOK (Hardtail e-mountain bike)Choose from 27.5" or 29" .Inspired by the Beauty, Strength and Agility of the SPRINGBOK.#1 The FrameMaterial : Alloy 6061Artwork: High quality enamel gloss with anti-rust treatment . Green and Black with White trims.Wheel / Fork type and size : 27.5" or 29"EU Frame safety standard-tested : EN15194.Available Sizes to choose from : Medium 17" , Large 19" , Extra large 21"#2 The MotorMotor is Protected inside the frame from outdoor elements - rain , mud ,direct sunlight and potential knocks from rocks or other objects during riding.Two protective alloy plates - one on either side of the frame/motor are removable for motor maintenance.Motor housing has Air flow holes on the underside of the frame ensuring an even flow of cool air during riding.Motor Plates further protect against salt spray & water splash - ideal for coastal regions.BBS and BBSHD motors are known to be notoriously quiet and torquey.Smooth Ride: Motors can be re-programmed from factory default settings to your own customizable parameters. This is one of the beauties of such a versatile ebike kit : the ability to Re-programme the settings to configures one's own personal preferences.Motor Fine-tuning : Riders own preferences for power, speed , pedal assist ( each of the 9 levels of PAS may be adjusted ) . Via a programming tool to suit each riders style and preferences.Motor swap : Swap out and upgrade or downsize motors as required and as your needs change.Choice of 3 Motors: Choose the motor for your SPRINGBOK that best suits you:A) Truck Run 250w Mid DriveTorque 70nM. 9 levels of Pedal assist (PAS). Average speed 25-28 km/h.If you are under 90 kg this motor will be sufficient for assistance on steep hills*(B) Bafang BBS02B 500w Mid DriveTorque 85nM. 9 levels of Pedal assist (PAS). Average speed 32km/h.Fully reprogrammable parameters - configure to your own riding preferences.If you are under 110kg this motor will be sufficient for assistance on steep hills*(C) Bafang BBSHD 1000w M615 Mid drive.Fully reprogrammable parameters - configure to your own riding preferences160nM. 9 levels of Pedal assist (PAS) . Average speed 45km/h.Freedom to ride at wider range of levels of power low ~ high.If you are under 160kg this motor will be sufficient for assistance even on the steepest of hills*

title: EMTB | ELECTRIC BICYCLES | ELECTRIC MTB | EBIKES MID DRIVE E-BIKES | HUB DRIVE | PEDELEC EMTB
text: Electric bikesAre you looking for an electric bike that suits you?Are you looking for an e-bike that specifically suits your own sitting position ,height , weight and your overall levels of comfort needs? We saw how people like you are frustrated with not being able to enjoy rides they way you should. And the lack of companies who really care to ensure they match the customers needs with the right e-bike system.  The Prime goal - Experience fun and exercise on an electric bike built to one's own individual needs.1. SUPPORT SUSTAINABILITY AND NON-WASTE :You may already own a bicycle that suits your preferences in frame size and specs . It's sitting there unused Or if you dont already own a bike pls check our website to see if you fancy any of our complete e-bikes:www.chilledsquirrel.comIf you currently  own a normal bicycle / bike and are in the market for an  electric bike  then it is super  important that you do your homework before rushing ahead to sell your bike. Just the air shock alone on your bike today alone may be worth over R10,000! Prices of some branded components have sky-rocketed .Selling your bike second hand as a used bike is likely to be at a loss due to the poor ROI (return on investment) for used bikes in South Africa and the inconvenience of of having to sell it.It would be smarter to upgrade your current bike to electric via a seamless conversion with new e-bike pedal assist technology .Our team can help you evaluate this. Please take 1 minute to fill in this form and a member of our Chilled Team can ge back to you:https://www.chilledsquirrel.com/convertbiketoelectric2. SEAMLESS INTEGRATIONIn 2014 we converted bicycles for Google's New JHB offices for staff commuting . Since then we have continued upgrading systems as the technology has improved for motors and batteries . Int'l EU tested standard motor + battery systems .3. MORE CHOICES & FLEXIBILITYChoices of mid drive and hub drive systems that are fully serviceable in S.A.A complete electric bike with your own personalized level of power , range and comfort at a reasonable investment.4. LOCAL SUPPORT | SERVICES.A company that cares and is truly passionate about what we do and the value it brings to others.We deliver door-to-door Nation-wide in S.A with local support helping you care for ,maintain and service your e-bike.100% Satisfaction & Money Back GuaranteeChilled Squirrel Electric Bikes www.chilledsquirrel.comTel 0214470304WhatsApp: 065 513 1524

title: Electric Bikes | e-MTB | Electric Bicycles | Mid drive ebikes | Hub drive e-bikes | E-bike adventure
text: Electric bikesAre you looking for an electric bike that suits you?Are you looking for an e-bike that specifically suits your own sitting position ,height , weight and your overall levels of comfort needs? We saw how people like you are frustrated with not being able to enjoy rides they way you should. And the lack of companies who really care to ensure they match the customers needs with the right e-bike system.  The Prime goal - Experience fun and exercise on an electric bike built to one's own individual needs.1. SUPPORT SUSTAINABILITY AND NON-WASTE :You may already own a bicycle that suits your preferences in frame size and specs . It's sitting there unused Or if you dont already own a bike pls check our website to see if you fancy any of our complete e-bikes:www.chilledsquirrel.comIf you currently  own a normal bicycle / bike and are in the market for an  electric bike  then it is super  important that you do your homework before rushing ahead to sell your bike. Just the air shock alone on your bike today alone may be worth over R10,000! Prices of some branded components have sky-rocketed .Selling your bike second hand as a used bike is likely to be at a loss due to the poor ROI (return on investment) for used bikes in South Africa and the inconvenience of of having to sell it.It would be smarter to upgrade your current bike to electric via a seamless conversion with new e-bike pedal assist technology .Our team can help you evaluate this. Please take 1 minute to fill in this form and a member of our Chilled Team can ge back to you:https://www.chilledsquirrel.com/convertbiketoelectric2. SEAMLESS INTEGRATIONIn 2014 we converted bicycles for Google's New JHB offices for staff commuting . Since then we have continued upgrading systems as the technology has improved for motors and batteries . Int'l EU tested standard motor + battery systems .3. MORE CHOICES & FLEXIBILITYChoices of mid drive and hub drive systems that are fully serviceable in S.A.A complete electric bike with your own personalized level of power , range and comfort at a reasonable investment.4. LOCAL SUPPORT | SERVICES.A company that cares and is truly passionate about what we do and the value it brings to others.We deliver door-to-door Nation-wide in S.A with local support helping you care for ,maintain and service your e-bike.100% Satisfaction & Money Back GuaranteeChilled Squirrel Electric Bikes www.chilledsquirrel.comTel 0214470304WhatsApp: 065 513 1524

title: CamelBak Rogue hydration pack (New)
text:
Camelbak hydration pack


Brand new still sealed 

About
Lightweight, ready for your next adventure!
The Rogue is everything you crave for everyday life: minimal, durable, cool and comfortable.
The sleek, lightweight design features the Air Support™ Light Back Panel and a ventilated harness for effective cooling and ultimate breathability. itThe total 7-liter capacity includes a 2-liter Crux® Reservoir with Quicklink™ disconnect. Stow and secure a light layer in the stretch overflow pocket and always be seen with reflective safety detailing.
With a secured, zippered pocket to store your keys and phone, plus adjustable sternum straps for a customThe foil is a used 1600cm2 Super-Stoke with converted plate mount mast of 85cm. Wingspan is 83cm. It's a great all round foil for wing, Sup and wake foiling.   Lifts early. It does have a slower top end speed since the profile is fatter. Unlike high Aspect wings it turns very well. Good entry into wingfoiling. Edges are pretty blunt.fit, helmet carry and increased stability, you'll be ready to start your adventure.
Product Features
Lightweight and Durable Materials
Air Support™ Light Back Panel: Designed with body mapping technology for efficient ventilation & lightweight comfort
Ventilated Harness: Lightweight and breathable
Secure Zippered Pocket: Perfect for keys, phone, or other essentials
Helmet Carry: Stow and secure helmet
Adjustable Sternum Strap: Offers a range of adjustments for a custom fit and increased stability
Reflectivity: For low light safety
Light Loop: Clip on a light to make the ride to and from the trailhead safe
Tube Trap Management: Keeps your tube secure and accessible
Elastic Pump Loop
Product Specifications
User Group: Men's
BPA/BPS/BPF Free
Pack Weight: 215g
Hydration Type: CRUX™ Reservoir included
Torso Fit Range: 38-53cm
Gear Capacity: 5L

Perfect helmet for high demands in cyclocross and road cycling. This helmet is characterised by MIPS brain protection system, Halo 3D adjustment system and an unparalleled ventilation. The removable visor changes your look when needed for MTB or road biking.

light and stable In-Mold construction with light Polycarbonate Microshell outer shell

the integrated MIPS protection system absorbs and dispenses rotational forces in case of a diagonal impact Convincing protection from traumatic brain injuries!

very good ventilation thanks to inside air flow channels and large holes in front and back

excellent comfort due to innovative HALO one-hand adjustment system which allows for easy individual adjustment to the shape of your head

bacteriostatic X-Static liner pads

removable visor

reflective sticker

title: EMTB CONVERSIONS E-BIKE KITS CONVERT YOUR BICYCLE INTO ELECTRIC BIKE CHILLED SQUIRREL CAPE TOWN
text: Electric bikesAre you looking for an electric bike that suits you?Are you looking for an e-bike that specifically suits your own sitting position ,height , weight and your overall levels of comfort needs? We saw how people like you are frustrated with not being able to enjoy rides they way you should. And the lack of companies who really care to ensure they match the customers needs with the right e-bike system.  The Prime goal - Experience fun and exercise on an electric bike built to one's own individual needs.1. SUPPORT SUSTAINABILITY AND NON-WASTE :You may already own a bicycle that suits your preferences in frame size and specs . It's sitting there unused Or if you dont already own a bike pls check our website to see if you fancy any of our complete e-bikes:www.chilledsquirrel.comIf you currently  own a normal bicycle / bike and are in the market for an  electric bike  then it is super  important that you do your homework before rushing ahead to sell your bike. Just the air shock alone on your bike today alone may be worth over R10,000! Prices of some branded components have sky-rocketed .Selling your bike second hand as a used bike is likely to be at a loss due to the poor ROI (return on investment) for used bikes in South Africa and the inconvenience of of having to sell it.It would be smarter to upgrade your current bike to electric via a seamless conversion with new e-bike pedal assist technology .Our team can help you evaluate this. Please take 1 minute to fill in this form and a member of our Chilled Team can ge back to you:https://www.chilledsquirrel.com/convertbiketoelectric2. SEAMLESS INTEGRATIONIn 2014 we converted bicycles for Google's New JHB offices for staff commuting . Since then we have continued upgrading systems as the technology has improved for motors and batteries . Int'l EU tested standard motor + battery systems .3. MORE CHOICES & FLEXIBILITYChoices of mid drive and hub drive systems that are fully serviceable in S.A.A complete electric bike with your own personalized level of power , range and comfort at a reasonable investment.4. LOCAL SUPPORT | SERVICES.A company that cares and is truly passionate about what we do and the value it brings to others.We deliver door-to-door Nation-wide in S.A with local support helping you care for ,maintain and service your e-bike.100% Satisfaction & Money Back GuaranteePrices From R24,999. Ask about our Nation-Wide Pick ups and Return Deliveries.Chilled Squirrel Electric Bikes www.chilledsquirrel.comTel 0214470304WhatsApp: 065 513 1524

text: Electric bikesAre you looking for an electric bike that suits you?Are you looking for an e-bike that specifically suits your own sitting position ,height , weight and your overall levels of comfort needs? We saw how people like you are frustrated with not being able to enjoy rides they way you should. The Prime goal - Experience fun and exercise on an electric bike built to one's own individual needs.1. SUPPORT SUSTAINABILITY AND NON-WASTE :You may already own a bicycle that suits your preferences in frame size and specs . It's sitting there unused Or if you dont already own a bike pls check our website to see if you fancy any of our complete e-bikes:www.chilledsquirrel.comIf you currently  own a normal bicycle / bike and are in the market for an  electric bike  then it is super  important that you do your homework before rushing ahead to sell your bike. Just the air shock alone on your bike today alone may be worth over R10,000! Prices of some branded components have sky-rocketed .Selling your bike second hand as a used bike is likely to be at a loss due to the poor ROI (return on investment) for used bikes in South Africa and the inconvenience of of having to sell it.It would be smarter to upgrade your current bike to electric via a seamless conversion with new e-bike pedal assist technology .Our team can help you evaluate this. text:
Tame this 2 kw e fat bike beast and search natures play grounds - beach and mountain trails - in fantastic comfort and all at your own speed.


We can build you a new fat bike or you can send us your existing bike and then we add an e - kit of your choice - 1 000 watt, 1500 watt or the  killer 2 000 watt monster.


The fun and exhilaration of the wind in your hair and the wonders of nature will have you back on your bike again and again!!


Give us a shout and lets put you on your way to amazing adventures and never ending beach rides.


Whatsapp me on 071 811 2907 and we can plan your escape from suburban boredom into natures magic delights!!


Cheers


Michael

title: Explore your dream beach on a fat bike
text:
Take this fat bike beaut anywhere you choose - as long as can dream of a place, you can go there with this fully tested Cape West Coast monster fat  bike - beach or farm roads!
This will be the most fun you have ever had on a bike on your favourite beach or you could fit out your fat bike  for some serious fishing trips.
You can go full crazy and let us fit your existing fat bike or one built by us with an electric motor and battery - ultimate mean beach machine with no limits on your fun!!
You owe it to yourself to join this group of e bike beach roamers who only wish they had done this years ago!!
Give us a call and let us get you out there on the beach where you belong!!

Call or whatsapp Michael on 071 811 2907

title: Fat bike mean dream beach machine
text:
This Cape West Coast battle tested beach fat bike beast is snugly at home on the rugged sun ravaged West Coast shoreline or swaggering along the scorching West Coast farm tracks that only giant Cape Cobras nonchalantly saunter along.
We build the mean machine according to your hardcore conditions leaving you with a beautifully crafted killer machine primed to thrill you and dare you - every time you hit the trail and take on nature's wild challenge - again and again!!
We can turbo boost your adrenaline to Mars with an e bike kit on your existing bike  that will blow your mind - you set the limit and we create the magic!
Give us a shout or whatsapp Michael on 071 811 2907 and we can chat.

title: Mountain e Bike Rocket Beast!
text:
Mountain Bike mean machine -   let your e bike rip up those mountain tracks and explore those farm roads.
Feel the raw power and experience the beauty of nature as your e bike takes you wherever your imagination chooses to fly to.
We can take your existing bike or we can build up a bike for you then attach your choice of e bike kit.

title: 2 kw  E Fat Bike Beach Monster
text:
Explode your fun limits and blow your adrenaline reserves on a 2 kw e fat bike that will fly you to your leisure hideaway's , secret fishing spot's or just ripping along an obscure bush track.


With 40 km and upward range to take you  places at a pace of your choice.


Enjoy the wonders of nature with the eco friendly beach and trail e fat bike machine.


Give me a shout and together we can put together a personal dream machine for your spectacular pleasure and effortless journey seeking nature's bountiful hidden treasures - all at your pace and direction.


Whatsapp me on 071 811 2907 and I will send you all the info and pic's you will need to start your flight into your imagination and beyond!

title: Mountain e bike trail ripper
text:
Super charge your existing mountain bike with a 1000 watt, 1500 watt or the insane 2 000 watt e bike motor that will blast you from your comfy couch into the wild outdoors.


Take effortlessly to the many trails nature intended you to travel - inhale the freshest air with wild abandon and delight in the tranquil beauty of natures bounty - just a hop and a skip from the suburban nightmare!


Be finally free to roam the vast trails, all at your speed and your leisure soaking up the sunshine and atmosphere patiently waiting just for you and your e bike.


We can transform your existing bike or build a new bike into an e bike machine that will allow you to take flight and explore.
